body:
I wasn't able to map the failure to any recently merged PR.
@mhaidrygoog   can you take a look?

I saw this in my tests too. This is a real issue because the compiler generates a 2 byte store for the boolean bit field `retry_dispatched`. Fix is easy and I'll send a fix soon.

cc/ @vjpai
doesn't look like this completely fixed it. saw it again #17324

These are the kind of errors being seen now


Interesting, this is another (probably new) tsan error. Note the one byte stores (previous ones were all two byte stores) I'll take care of it.
